data.name: Blasting Agent: Ultimate Edition OST
data.detailed_description:
The Complete, Original Soundtrack to Blasting Agent: Ultimate Edition. Music composed by Kristian "Bunnymajs" Caldwell, with additional music by Fat Bard.

Track Listing:
  • Intro Theme - 01:26
  • Mt. Snow - 01:40
  • Snow Cave - 02:02
  • Jungle Cave - 01:26
  • Volcano Lair - 01:02
  • Boss Theme - 02:40
  • Rocket Blasting Off - 02:02
  • Moon Landing - 02:09
  • Moon Base - 00:53
  • The Moon is not Cheese - 01:53
  • Man, Tank, Core - 02:48
  • Ending Theme - 01:18
